interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: OUTRE TIMELESS PINEAPPLE PONY - SWEETIE #950 Review Date: 2018/11/01 Store: Outre Product Description: ['Outre Synthetic Hair Ponytail Timeless Pineapple Ponytail Sweetie', 'TIMELESS PINEAPPLE PONYTAIL', "Pick your curl pattern and get an instant curly updo with timeless Ponytail's Pineapple Drawstring. These curly puffs feature gorgeous curls that fall down your forehead for an effortlessly tousled look. Innovatively designed with a clip to attach to the front of your hairline, and a drawstring to attach to your hair, Timeless Ponytail's Pineapple Drawstring was made for the stylish woman on-the-go.", 'HOW TO WEAR', 'Brush your hair back into a high bun.', 'Brush your hair back into a high bun.', 'Attach the piece to your own bun, and pull the drawstring so that it is securely fastened.', 'Attach the piece to your own bun, and pull the drawstring so that it is securely fastened.', 'Extend the front of the piece forward and clip it just behind your hairline, so that the curls fall loosely down your forehead.', 'Extend the front of the piece forward and clip it just behind your hairline, so that the curls fall loosely down your forehead.', 'Fluff the curls, and go!', 'Fluff the curls, and go!', 'Tip:For a more voluminous look, pull your hair up into an even higher bun.', 'Tip:For a more voluminous look, pull your hair up into an even higher bun.'] Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Color': '950', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Outre', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 6 x 2.76 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '827298792451', 'Manufacturer': 'OUTRE'} Review Text: ☆I.m not going to give it a low score just because i didn.t care for it. It looks as described and like the pic...i just didn't care for it for me. It looked more like a curly afro puff almost on me.
I like the bangs. If they made this in a body wave or thick curls, it would be nice also.
If this could be made in different textures and curl type it would be great.. it would give us choices. Review Title: Not for me but you might love it. Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

HOSL Flat Makeup Brushes Contour Brush Foundation Brush-1 PCS Silver and Black Color (Silver and Black) HOSL {'Brand': 'HOSL', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Contour, For Foundation', 'Color': 'Silver', 'Material': 'Silver', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 1 x 0.75 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '794438000540'} Love it. Great price. Awesome price. Susenstone20 pcs/set Makeup Brush Set (Gold2) {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '20', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Brass', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '644735066810'} I've had these almost a year and I use them just about every day and they're holding up really well.. They don't shed, haven't broken or stretched out of shape. I like them a lot. Love them. Dem Edges Tinted Edge Control (MEGA HOLD, BLACK) Dem Edges Tinted Edge Control {'Hair Type': 'Dry, Thin', 'Material Type Free': 'Alcohol-free,Oil-free,Paraben-free', 'Scent': 'Argan,Argan Oil', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'Dem Edges Tinted Edge Control', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.7 x 2.7 x 1.7 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'DETEC', 'UPC': '652671101229 019962850936'} I am madly in love with this stuff. Works really really well in covering grays! LOOOOVE IT* OUTRE TIMELESS PINEAPPLE PONY - SWEETIE #950 Outre ['Outre Synthetic Hair Ponytail Timeless Pineapple Ponytail Sweetie', 'TIMELESS PINEAPPLE PONYTAIL', "Pick your curl pattern and get an instant curly updo with timeless Ponytail's Pineapple Drawstring. These curly puffs feature gorgeous curls that fall down your forehead for an effortlessly tousled look. Innovatively designed with a clip to attach to the front of your hairline, and a drawstring to attach to your hair, Timeless Ponytail's Pineapple Drawstring was made for the stylish woman on-the-go.", 'HOW TO WEAR', 'Brush your hair back into a high bun.', 'Brush your hair back into a high bun.', 'Attach the piece to your own bun, and pull the drawstring so that it is securely fastened.', 'Attach the piece to your own bun, and pull the drawstring so that it is securely fastened.', 'Extend the front of the piece forward and clip it just behind your hairline, so that the curls fall loosely down your forehead.', 'Extend the front of the piece forward and clip it just behind your hairline, so that the curls fall loosely down your forehead.', 'Fluff the curls, and go!', 'Fluff the curls, and go!', 'Tip:For a more voluminous look, pull your hair up into an even higher bun.', 'Tip:For a more voluminous look, pull your hair up into an even higher bun.'] {'Color': '950', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Outre', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 6 x 2.76 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '827298792451', 'Manufacturer': 'OUTRE'} ☆I.m not going to give it a low score just because i didn.t care for it. It looks as described and like the pic...i just didn't care for it for me. It looked more like a curly afro puff almost on me.
I like the bangs. If they made this in a body wave or thick curls, it would be nice also.
If this could be made in different textures and curl type it would be great.. it would give us choices. Not for me but you might love it.
profile:
**User Preferences Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: The user has a strong focus on makeup tools, including brushes, and has expanded their interest to hair care products for styling and maintenance. Recent purchases indicate an exploration of hair accessories that complement their beauty regime.
- **Aesthetic Choices**: They favor sleek, sophisticated designs in silver and black while appreciating gold accents, maintaining a versatile approach to aesthetic across both makeup and hair care.
- **Value Sensitivity**: The user remains budget-conscious, seeking quality items at reasonable prices, including hair care products and accessories, while showing willingness to try new styles.
- **Quality Expectation**: They value high standards and effective performance across products, evident from their positive experience highlighting the need for various options in hair textures and styles.
- **Inclusivity in Selection**: Their preferences lean towards versatile products suitable for diverse skin tones and hair types, reflecting a commitment to inclusivity in both cosmetic and hair care selections.
- **Positive Engagement**: The user shows enthusiasm in product interactions, sharing honest feedback that reflects their experience, indicating an evolving breadth of engagement in beauty routines that now includes hair styling solutions.

This updated profile showcases a discerning, budget-conscious individual who is committed to quality across a broad spectrum of beauty tools and products while maintaining an appreciation for diverse aesthetics and functionality.
